publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3471.1 Colin Fox: Tribute to Rosa Parks, American Civil Rights Campaigner—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3471) in the name of Trish Godman, after "acknowledges that" insert "Rosa Parks was a member of the American Communist Party and that". Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-3471.1 Colin Fox: Tribute to Rosa Parks, American Civil Rights Campaigner—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3471) in the name of Trish Godman, after "acknowledges that" insert "Rosa Parks was a member of the American Communist Party and that".
